name: Life & Banc Split Corp. Class A Shares
longDescription: To provide holders of Preferred shares with fixed cumulative preferential quarterly cash distributions and to return the original issue price on the maturity date. To provide holders of Class A shares with regular monthly cash distributions4 and the opportunity for capital appreciation.
fulldescription: To provide holders of Preferred shares with fixed cumulative preferential quarterly cash distributions and to return the original issue price on the maturity date. To provide holders of Class A shares with regular monthly cash distributions4 and the opportunity for capital appreciation. To achieve these objectives, the Fund invests in a common share portfolio composed of the Canadian banks and four Canadian life insurance companies on an equally weighted basis at the time of investment and on any subsequent rebalancing
fullAddress: 181 Bay Street, Brookfield Place,Suite 2930, P.O. Box 793, Toronto, ON, CA
